title: Dark Souls on League of Legends
body:
Dark Souls 3 is right around the corner. I know there are a good number of Souls fans in  the league communaty. I say why not try and get in on the hype by playing some champs that could be part of some of the Souls' world 

{{champion:89}}  Sunbro
{{champion:131}}  Moonbro
{{champion:79}}  Sunbro skin
{{champion:63}}  Chaos Servant
{{champion:1}}  Chaos Servant
{{champion:3}}  Bell Gargoyle 
{{champion:60}} Quelaag
{{champion:102}} Dragon Covenant
{{champion:83}} Gank Squad

I am sure there could be more, but you get the idea. Just a fun idea, hope some of you guys go with it.

replies.body:
{{champion:24}} That one creature from the bloodborne dlc?

It's not dark souls... But it's damn close.
Which dude? I don't think anything from The Old Hunters looks like Jax.

Ah, the church executioners. Yeah, I can kind of see what you mean.

Somewhat related.
Is it weird that I play Dark Souls to **unwind** after playing League?
I do the same thing. So ether we are both weird, or Dark Souls is a lot less stressful then League
